reviews.review: I think it's still one of the best games of all time honestly. I don't know how many times I've replayed it

Following Chel on another Portal adventure is a treat. This time around we're introduced to new characters, who bring another charm to the game. The game has COOP, where you struggle to complete Glados' challenges and complete the tests she puts before you. This is a fantastic puzzle game.
This game is great. Great and funny voice acting, Great puzzles, great ending. My favorite game of all time. Yes.
Just the best game to play in a co-op with a friend!
eğlenceli bir oyun parasını hak ediyor.
Good game but im dumb so its hard
самая лучшая головоломка от первого лица!
This is one of the most fun and enjoyable games i have ever played.
It's Fun, Enjoyable, this game teach you how to use your knowledge in your mind to help you finish every stage on this game. & dont forget about the co-op, more Robot more Fun!!
лучшая игра на всем белом свете

Проведённые тесты показали, что это отличная игра, хотя мы на это и не тестировали.
10 тортиков из 10
loved it. not the part where i had to solve puzzles tho.

Really fun with friends 

just really fun to fuck about with lol

Чтожь , игра мне понравилась , особенно мультиплеер , хоть тут просто решаешь головоломки , но это интересно , про мультиплеер , ну , с друзьями порешать головоломки можно, ведь там чисто Team work  ,ну и всё , мне понравилось
Eigentlich ist zu Portal und Portal 2 schon alles gesagt. Geniales Spielprinzip. Super gealtert. Macht immer noch Spaß. Muss man gespielt haben.
When life gives you lemons, you laugh your ass off
Muahhahahahahah its so fun to remove light bridges from beneath your teammate XD
这么经典的游戏只要三块钱啊，还不快买爆
U Need 1000 IQ To Play This Game xD
Excelente juego, la mejor secuela que he jugado, implementa nuevas mecánicas que hacen muy entretenido el juego

Played this game on console as well as Pc.

Pros(Simplified)
-Great story behind the game
-one of the best puzzle games of all time
-easy to run

Cons(simplified)
-As an older game, it can sometimes feel wonky to get settings adjusted to where they are today
-isn't graphically amazing
-Puzzles may leave younger players frustrated

Amazing game, I feel like pros greatly outway the cons. If you are reading this during a sale, the game can go down to 99cents, which is an incredible steal. recommend even for the $9.99 can last many hours in gameplay. (Some puzzles can be a challenge though)
amazing mechanics. awesome puzzles. never gets old. a game you can always come back to no matter how many times you've beat it.
Portal 2 is way better than Portal you can imagine. Very interesting world leaning the dimensions. I would definitely recommend this game to people who likes mysterys puzzles or interesting games.

Игра шикарная! Прошёл её за 10 часов, долг конечно. Игру советую, пойдёт даже на самых старых корытах. Сюжет полностью понятен даже без прохождения первой части, а эта игра очень тесно связанна с сюжетом первой части. Особое внимание хотелось бы уделить графике на 2012 год она безупречна! Оптимизация сделанна на высшем уровне!
劇情很有趣，喜歡卡關許久時突然發現通關方法的感覺。

Another classic game I recently got around to playing after owning for years. It absolutely deserves the hype. The game adds creative new elements to the ideas in the original; the puzzles aren't especially difficult but they do force you to think. And the story is well-told with world design that complements it perfectly.
Игруха старенькая, но очень интересная, советую) (да и дешевая)

[h1]Portal 2[/h1]


I am absolutely in awe with how beautiful and amazing this game is. I'm not even going to try to review it, just do it. BUY IT. Immediately.
I'm going to say this for the millionth time. This game is great and is a cornerstone of Valve's marketplace.
O jogo é bom, divertido em Coop mas chato em sigleplayer, não tem nada para descontrair
eski gunlere geri donmek isteyenler icin birebir
Amo esse jogo, cada puzzle resolvido te faz sentir um gênio ♥
Супер пиздатая головоломка, а в коопе и подавно!

Easily one of the greatest Valve games created, although the game itself is not too difficult it follows a fantastic plot. The voice actors mixed with the environment creates a perfect atmosphere for any sort of gamer. Truly a timeless classic and a must have game if you're new to PC gaming.
me lo complete entero y me parecio bueno, siento que mi Coeficiencia intelectual mejoro
Gostei muito do modo coperativo e tem que pensar mt pra passar das fases achei top

Personally I think portal 2 is a great puzzle game and it has outsmarted me many times for reasons including but not limited to overthinking puzzles or under thinking them and having to get portals at a specific spot
Espere que saliera las rebajas de verano y luego de años por fin puedo jugar el modo cooperativo!
Bom para jogar offline e melhor ainda para jogar com o amigo.
Первая часть была скучной. Но вторая 10/10.
